title: Gauley River National Recreation Area: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Stay up to date with Gauley River news Gauley River National Recreation Area strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur in the park by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting current news releases to this website.  Â       Social Media For current information and park updates, check out our facebook page or follow us on twitter:  www.facebook.com/newrivergorgenps  https://Twitter.com/NewRiverNPS
